title: So a friend of mine just played his first 10 rankeds
body:
He went 0-10. He has no idea how to play the game. He ignored me telling him to not play ranked

Guess where he got placed?

Bronze II.

BRONZE TWO. After going 0-10.

Riot, are you serious? Do you realize he's gonna lose his teammates like 50 games before dropping to bronze V? How does someone who goes 0-10 even get placed in Bronze 2? What the heck is wrong with your placement system?


PS: No, i'm not lying.

Edit: This post is about how fucked riot placement system is to allow this to happen. Not about him. He'll drop eventually, but not before fucking up over 50 games.
